thread.title: Aldi plays with trendier store decor
thread.title_full: Aldi plays with trendier store decor

title: Aldi plays with trendier store decor
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Aldi plays with trendier store decor Aldi plays with trendier store decor 4 hrs ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
German discounter Aldi is experimenting with a flashier store fitout as it prepares to expand beyond Australia's eastern states. Aldi has revamped four stores in the past six months and will reopen another four, including one at Manly in Sydney on Wednesday, as part of new layout trial. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
